description: The RCA PCHSTAB1R puts USB and AC outlets where you need them most, from the bedroom, office, family room or kitchen. It includes a convenient power outlet at the table for clock radios, lamps, laptop use, etc. It's compatible with iPod, iPhone and iPad among other AC and other 30-pin devices.
title: RCA PCHSTAB1R 30-Pin Charging Dock with Device Cradle
